member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RS232
member.summary: An RS232 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RS232.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RS232.Configure
member.summary: Initializes the serial port with the parameters 9600 baud, 8N1, with no flow control.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RS232.Configure(System.Int32,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.SerialParity,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.SerialStopBits,System.Int32,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.HardwareFlowControl)
member.summary: Initializes the serial port with the given parameters.
member.param: The number of data bits to use.
